Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngakho-ke iNkosi yabo yabaphendula (emithandazweni yabo). Angisoze ngavumela ukuba kulahleke umsebenzi wanoma ngabe yisiphi isisebenzi phakathi kwenu, noma ngabe isilisa noma ngabe isifazane abanye benu bayingxenye yabanye, ngakho-ke labo abafuduka futhi abakhishwa emakhaya abo futhi behlushwa endleleni yami, balwa futhi babulawa ngempela ngiyosula izenzo zabo ezimbi bese ngibafaka ezivandeni okugobhoza imifula ngaphansi kwazo (lokho) kungumvuzo ovela kuMvelinqangi futhi kuMvelinqangi kunemivuzo engcono kakhulu
Nize ningakhohliswa ukuyaluza kwalabo abangakholwa ezweni
Kuyinjabulo encane ngakho-ke indawo yabo yokuhlala kuyoba isihogo futhi yimbi (leyo) ndawo yokuphumula

Kodwa labo abesaba iNkosi yabo okwabo yizivande okugobhoza imifula ngaphansi kwazo, bayohlala khona ingunaphakade lokho kuyinjabulo evela kuMvelinqangi futhi lokho okukuMvelinqangi kungcono kakhulu kulabo abalungile

Futhi ngempela phakathi kwabantu bencwadi kukhona labo abakholwa kuMvelinqangi nakulokho okwembulwa kunina nakulokho okwembulwa kubona, bezithoba ngokuzinikela kuMvelinqangi abawathengi amavesi kaMvelinqangi ngenani elincane labo-ke okwabo umvuzo wabo useNkosini yabo ngempela uMvelinqangi ungosheshayo ekubaleni (ekwahluleleni)
Oh nina enikholwayo! Bekezelani ngisho nangaphezulu kokubezela futhi nibe munye nesabe uMvelinqangi ukuze niphumelele
